contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 27, 1912 D Victorian State Championships (A Grade)
Victorian State Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Victorian State Championships victorian-state-championships
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Madam Butterfly
Ballat City Oval , Ballarat, Victoria, Australia A serious complication arose. Initially the Rozelle Band was acclaimed the winners being incorrectly awarded 95 pts for the Test & 93 for Own Choice + 188 pts Later it was discovered that they in fact received 92 pts for the Test . and Total of 185 pts Elevating Geelong Municipal to 1st place 186 pts & relegating Rozelle to 2nd place with a revised total of 185 pts
Feb. 21, 2020, 3:06 a.m. Feb. 21, 2020, 3:41 a.m.
1 Geelong City Thomas. E. Bulch
2 Rozelle Municipal (NSW) William Partington
3 Geelong Harbour Trust (Vic) Harry Shugg
4 St Augustine Orphanage (Ballarat) Les Hoffman
5 City of Perth Brass Band Unknown
6 Adelaide Tramways (Sth Aust) Christopher Smith
7 Manly Municipal (NSW) Jerry Phelong
